mapper.select: select rownum, from community order by comm_date
mapper.update: update community set COMM_TITLE = #{commTitle}, COMM_CONTENTS = #{commContents} where COMM_NUM = #{commNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(REPLY_NUM, REPLY_DATE, REPLY_CONTENT, MEMBER_NUM, COMM_NUM, MEMBER_ID) VALUES ((select nvl(max(REPLY_NUM),0) + 1 from reply) ,SYSDATE, #{replyContent}, #{memberNum}, #{commNum},#{memberId})
